description:

BUY Hotwire Foam Factory Sculpting tool:
(USA) http://amzn.to/2rEsi5P  (Canada) http://amzn.to/2tvEGGP

BUY Proxxon Handheld Hotwire Cutter (requires power supply):
(USA) http://amzn.to/2sVNdWk (Canada) http://amzn.to/2tPUbIP

BUY Proxxon Power supply for handheld tools:
(USA) http://amzn.to/2rXh8s6 (Canada) http://amzn.to/2sVNx7l

(As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases)


➳  http://www.blackmagiccraft.ca
➳ Facebook: https://goo.gl/hvNgQL

In this TPK I discuss how I manage my time to accomodate such an involved hobby, talk a little bit more about foam, and discuss the merits of handheld hotwire tools. I also do a brief comparrison between the Hotwire Foam Factory Sculpting tool and the Proxxon Thermocut. 
















Black Magic Craft intro music by Black Magic Craft

Background music:
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
title: TPK: Handheld Hotwire Tools, Time Management, & More Foam Info (Black Magic Craft Episode 042)
